description: This file contains test cases for the backend API endpoints related to an interview flow, using pytest as the testing framework. It includes functions that test authentication, session status retrieval, and answering questions within the interview process.

methods.name: _auth(token: str)
methods.description: Helper function to generate authorization headers with a Bearer token.

methods.name: test_start_requires_auth(client)

methods.description: Comprehensive test simulating the flow of starting an interview, checking status, submitting an answer, and verifying responses.
